content:
Hi everyone.

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/88268 has been open for more than two months now and is blocking my rework of the rustdoc search to finally fix it.

Could someone take a look at it please? If you need any help understanding the PR, don't hesitate to ask.

I insist on this: it's a very important PR and the fix for the rustdoc search is blocked on it. I'd really like for the rustdoc search to be finally fixed after years of a broken state.

Thanks in advance!
I'm sorry for not reviewing it; I just don't understand the code well enough to be able to review it properly.

No problem, don't worry. In fact, you already reviewed the big part of the PR since the JS is pretty minor. At this point I wonder if we cannot simply accept it as is since the JS tests ensured that it was still working as expected and that I implemented @Nemo157's suggestion.

In fact, you already reviewed the big part of the PR since the JS is pretty minor.

I gave some feedback on it, but I would like someone else to look at the Rust side too since I don't understand the code very well.
